Skip to main content Brewing Co. & Taproom 
EDMUND'S OAST

Brewing Co. & Taproom

1505 King St. #115, Charleston, SC 29405
Open today from 11am - 9pm Menus Location & Hours Events FAQs Private Events Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. & Taproom 
Welcome to our production brewery and taproom restaurant! All of our beers you encounter in the eleven states (and counting) in which we distribute were brewed at this facility. Join us daily at our adjoining taproom restaurant to enjoy our all-day food menu from Executive Chef Alex Yellan and a bevy of beer, wine, cocktail, and N/A options. We also have spacious outdoor seating options on our patio or in our expansive courtyard and astroturf field.
Order Online Purchase Gift Card Arrow Icon An arrow icon Arrow Icon An arrow icon Plan your visit 
To our production brewery, taproom, and casual restaurant.

social media Where Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. and Taproom located? 
1505 King Street, Charleston, SC 29405. For more information visit
the Brewing Co. page. Do you serve food at Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. and Taproom? 
Boy, do we!
View our full menu. Where can I find out about new releases and events? 
Instagram, Facebook, and our e-mail newsletter. !
Sign up to find out more Do you have a happy hour at Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. and Taproom? 
You bet! Hoppy Hour runs from 4pm to 6pm Monday through Friday. Enjoy half off draft beers, and other rotating food and drink specials!
Do you take reservations at the Brewing Co.? 
Nah.
I didn’t close my tab last night, what should I do? 
When tabs are left open, we close them out at the end of the night and add 22% gratuity for our staff.
Is the Brewing Co. dog friendly? 
WE. LOVE. DOGS. We cannot legally allow pets inside as we’re a full-service restaurant, but we’d love to have your fur babies join us outside!
Do you sell beer to-go from the Brewing Co.? 
Indeed. Please come during business hours and we’ll load you up!
Do you offers tours at the Brewing Co.? 
We currently do not.
Brewing Co. Private Events Beer Library Distributors

[Page Title: Beers | Edmunds Oast Brewing CoFilter Icon]

Skip to main content 
The worlds that populate the beer flavor universe are so vast they might be infinite. We consider it our calling and our privilege to explore this space to our fullest capacity, all the while tuning our internal engines of quality and consistency. The simple alchemy of water, malt, hops, and yeast provide all the tools we need to continue to churn out fermented beverages that hopefully evoke familiarity and mystery, comfort and excitement, but most of all, delight.

Our beer labels are designed and illustrated by .
Blake Fili Suárez Reset Filters

[Page Title: Brewing Co. & Taproom Private Events | Edmunds Oast Brewing CoArrow IconArrow Icon]

Skip to main content 
Party At The Brewing Co.

Edmund’s Oast Brewing Company is located at 1505 King Street on the campus of Pacific Box. The EOBC kitchen is known for approachable, innovative food from around the world via acclaimed Executive Chef Alex Yellan. The bustling production brewery situated behind the taproom distributes beer to 11 states (and counting) in cans and kegs.
Start Planning About The Space 
The Astroturf Lawn next to the brewery can be tented to accommodate ceremonies, receptions, fundraisers, and more. The Lawn allows for up to 200 people and would require tent(s) rental. The entire Pacific Box & Crate campus can be rented as a whole for events up to 1,000 people. For smaller, not-so-private dinners, sections of the taproom can be reserved for celebrations and meetings. The Taproom can hold up to 225 people in its entirety and includes a large full bar plus a rectangular patio.
Start Planning Arrow Icon An arrow icon Arrow Icon An arrow icon Explore Our Beers FAQs

1505 King Street, Charleston, SC 29405. For more information visit
the Brewing Co. page. Do you serve food at Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. and Taproom?

Instagram, Facebook, and our e-mail newsletter. !
Sign up to find out more Do you have a happy hour at Edmund’s Oast Brewing Co. and Taproom? 
You bet! Hoppy Hour runs from 4pm to 6pm Monday through Friday. Enjoy half off draft beers, and other rotating food and drink specials!
Do you take reservations at the Brewing Co.? 
Nah.
I didn’t close my tab last night, what should I do? 
When tabs are left open, we close them out at the end of the night and add 22% gratuity for our staff.
Is the Brewing Co. dog friendly? 
WE. LOVE. DOGS. We cannot legally allow pets inside as we’re a full-service restaurant, but we’d love to have your fur babies join us outside!
Do you sell beer to-go from the Brewing Co.? 
Indeed. Please come during business hours and we’ll load you up!
Do you offers tours at the Brewing Co.? 
We currently do not.
